
  #region
  
        public class NpcScript_1Ame_3: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +40,+1
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("肉",1000,1),
new GoodsItem("干肉",1000,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(10)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @quest();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @normal();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @quest()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(350,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q350();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(303,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q303();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @normal();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @normal()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临，有什么事情需要我帮忙吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","肉\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","卖","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","肉\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @q350()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            SuperSc.SetGVar(351,1);
Say2Content(t, "text","你都知道我的处境，还不答应我的请求。\r\n我自己想想，越想越恨你。\r\n你就自己一个去发大财吧。\r\n你去找一下在废弃的矿区连接通路的老人吧。\r\n他和你性格差不多，\r\n他会给你帮助的。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @q303()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","你把盟重蜀汉氏惹得不高兴，\r\n他只要和谁翻脸，就不会再想见那个人。\r\n他和我是老朋友了，只要你答应我一个请求，\r\n我会替你说情。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","接受","@q303_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","请求\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","拒绝","@q303_2");
Say2Content(t, "text","请求\r\n");
      }

      public  void @q303_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(20000)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q303_1_1();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @q303_1_2();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @q303_2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            SuperSc.SetGVar(350,1);
Say2Content(t, "text","哦，我知道了你的想法。\r\n你的人生只能靠你自己来走，\r\n走好。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @q303_1_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",20000);
SuperSc.SetGVar(303,0);
SuperSc.SetGVar(301,0);
Say2Content(t, "text","你答应我的请求？哦，真谢谢你。\r\n我的请求并不难，\r\n你身上有钱吗？我们家族经济上比较困难，\r\n需要20000金币，不好意思。\r\n快再去找一下蜀汉氏吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @q303_1_2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","原来你也没有钱。很抱歉，虽然很感谢你答应我的请求， \r\n但是看到你也不宽裕，我也不好请求你，你还是回去吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @buy()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请挑选要购买的物品。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @sell()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","如有品质好的肉，请卖给我吧。\r\n我会给你好价钱。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }
        }
        

        public class NpcScript_1Bme_0: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +40,+1
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@sell"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","您来这里卖肉吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","卖","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","肉\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @sell()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","我会用最高的价格购买高品质的肉。\r\n但是如果沾上泥土，或者被火焚烧过的，\r\n那我就只能用低廉的价格收购了。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }
        }
        

        public class NpcScript_1Bme_0102: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +40,+1
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("肉",1000,1),
new GoodsItem("干肉",1000,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(2)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @quest();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @normal();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @normal()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临，有什么事情需要我帮忙吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","肉\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","卖","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","肉\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @tmove()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(2)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("0",307,264);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(2)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("0",308,265);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @tmove();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @quest()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(312,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q312();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(310,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q310();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(309,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q309();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(305,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q305();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(304,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q304();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临，有什么事情需要我帮忙吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","肉\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","卖","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","肉\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @q304()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","你是听盟重蜀汉氏的话来这儿吧，\r\n来得好...我有件事情要请求你帮我。\r\n我听蜀汉氏讲你是一个很善良的人，\r\n请你一定答应我！\r\n\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "text","你接受了我的请求，非常感谢！\r\n不是别的，就是蜀汉氏给了我品质好的肉和鸡肉，\r\n要我帮他做料理。\r\n但是做料理，需要有厨师啊，\r\n所以请你帮忙找一位厨师吧。\r\n\r\n");

            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }

      public  void @q309_1()

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");

      }

        public class NpcScript_1Gme_0: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +40,+1
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@sell"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","您来这里卖肉吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","卖","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","肉\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","对话","@quest");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","取消","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","询问","@meathelp");
Say2Content(t, "text","如何获得肉\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @quest()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(752,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @quest3();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(751,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @quest1_2();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(750,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @quest1_1();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @quest2();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @quest3()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","去找助理小敏吧，他有话要和你说。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @quest1_2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","带来品质13以上的肉吗？？？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","带来","@quest1_2_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","品质13以上的肉\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","没找到","@quest1_2_2");
Say2Content(t, "text","品质13以上的肉\r\n");
      }

      public  void @quest1_2_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkdura("肉",13)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.Takecheckitem();
SuperSc.GiveItem("金币",1000);
SuperSc.SetGVar(752,1);
Say2Content(t, "text","你带来的肉品质很好。\r\n祝贺你啊！ 其实也没什么，不过会对你打猎有帮助的\r\n给你1000金币作为祝贺礼物吧。\r\n另外，请你再去找一下助理小敏，祝你好运！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","第一次会有一些困难，慢慢找吧！\r\n我会等您");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","来的。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @quest1_2_2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","第一次会有一些困难，慢慢找吧！\r\n我会等您");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","来的。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @quest1_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","您是听助理小敏的话来的吧？\r\n您好，我是肉店屠夫。\r\n我先再讲一遍割肉的方法：\r\n可以割的怪物有鸡，鹿，羊，粪虫，毒蜘蛛，楔蛾等等...\r\n可能目前还见不到这些怪物，\r\n但是以后慢慢会看到的。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续","@quest1_1_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @quest1_1_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","可以割肉的怪物有鸡，鹿，羊等等...\r\n杀死这些怪物之后，在怪物面前按几下alt+键盘（鼠标左键），\r\n就可以得到肉块。先按F9，就可以看到肉块在这些包裹中了。\r\n帮我带来一个品质13以上的肉块，\r\n这就是");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","您首先要做的事情。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
SuperSc.SetGVar(751,1);
      }

      public  void @quest2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","您对传奇世界了解得足够多了。\r\n我认为您自己一个人完全可以开拓自己的路，\r\n我是帮不上忙了，祝你好运。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @sell()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","我会用最高的价格购买高品质的肉。\r\n但是如果沾上泥土，或者被火焚烧过的，\r\n那我就只能用低廉的价格收购了。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @meathelp()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","肉可以从鸡，鹿，狼身上割的， 先打这些怪物，\r\n小心碰到比自己厉害的怪物被打死。\r\n打死怪物之后，按alt键，把鼠标放在怪物尸体上，\r\n您就会看到自己割肉的样子，\r\n过一会儿，您的包里就会放着一个大肉块。\r\n对了，差一点忘了告诉您，企图逃跑的怪物品质更好。\r\n为了方便，使用魔法打怪物，其品质会变成0，这一点千万记住。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }
        }
        

        public class NpcScript_1Mme_3: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +40,+1
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@sell"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(2)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @quest();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @normal();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @normal()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(303,1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我根本就不认识你！\r\n快走开，一看到你的脸，我就感觉恶心...\r\n还不快走！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","是来卖肉吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","卖","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","肉\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

            }
            else {
              
            }

              )

               &&

               && 
                // 0,0

              )

        public class NpcScript_2Awe_0151: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +5,+6,+43
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell","@repair"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("木剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("匕首",100,1),
new GoodsItem("乌木剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("青铜剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("短剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("铁剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("青铜斧",100,1),
new GoodsItem("海魂",100,1),
new GoodsItem("半月",100,1),
new GoodsItem("凌风",100,1),
new GoodsItem("鹤嘴锄",100,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎，您想要些什么？我们这里有许多便宜锋利的剑，请您挑选。\r\n根据这个城堡的主人");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","LORD");
Say2Content(t, "text","的命令，\r\n我们特别对");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","OWNERGUILD");
Say2Content(t, "text","的成员提供20%的折扣。\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","武器\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","武器\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","修理","@repair");
Say2Content(t, "text","武器\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","询问","@qweapon");
Say2Content(t, "text","有关武器的事\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @buy()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","不要担心我们这里武器的数量，请您尽量挑选您需要的武器。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @sell()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","放下你要出售的武器。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @repair()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","想修理武器吗？  你想修理哪个？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @repair_CB()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","看起来修好了，还有要修理的吗？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @qweapon()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","店里卖的武器其能力值是定值。\r\n但是妖魔身上的武器，有时根据不同情况，\r\n具有特殊功能。\r\n这种武器拿到店里来，会卖好价钱。\r\n对了，武器的价格按种类不同，其价格也不同，\r\n但是大体上，耐力越高越昂贵。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }
        }
        

        public class NpcScript_2Bbl_0: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +5,+6
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@s_repair"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","不想和你这样的可怜人作交易..\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎.. 有什么事情找我？ \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","特殊修理","@s_repair");
Say2Content(t, "text","武器\r\n与铁匠铺老板");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","对话","@talk");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @talk()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(205,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @quit();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(211,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @givekundo();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(210,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @kundo();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(204,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @accept();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(203,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @talk_1();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @quit();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @quit()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","今天的天气很不错吗。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
      }

      public  void @talk_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","哦，原来你就是卫家店所讲的那个人？\r\n看来他看人还有眼光啊。\r\n至于我，曾经可是很风光过。\r\n想听我的故事吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","听","@okheard");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","不听","@noheard");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @okheard()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checklevel(35)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @w_t_ok();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","嗯，看来你还不具备听我故事的资格。\r\n要想挑战我要讲的故事，凭你的能力是万万不行的。\r\n既然你已经找到这儿了，看在卫家店的面子上，\r\n我给你几张以前买的彩票。\r\n祝你好运。\r\n\r\n");
SuperSc.ResetGVar(200,20);
SuperSc.GiveItem("彩票",5);
            }
            
      }

      public  void @noheard()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            SuperSc.ResetGVar(210,10);
Say2Content(t, "text","那好吧，既然你不想听，\r\n那就离开吧..\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @w_t_ok()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","还是很会看人啊。\r\n不知你有没有听说过命运之刃？\r\n那是我为了学铁匠技术到处找师傅的时候，\r\n当时我年轻，血气旺盛，没有落过一个村庄，\r\n为了学到最高的技术，我走遍了所有的地方。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续","@next");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @next()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","我是江氏。生为男子汉，\r\n年轻时候立志要在自己的做事氛围成为第一。\r\n所以，过起了流浪生活。\r\n有一天到了一个小村庄，\r\n当时我只是想在这里填饱肚子，\r\n所以就先在附近找客栈。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续","@next_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @next_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","进入客栈，我叫老板，想点几个简单的菜，\r\n但是我发现他手里拿着的菜刀不是一般的刀，\r\n那把刀比我曾经见过的任何刀都要出色。\r\n那可是一把菜刀啊，你能相信吗？\r\n一把菜刀竟然比匠人制造的刀还要好。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续","@next_2");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @next_2()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","我缠上客栈老板，要他一定告诉我制造那把刀的人。\r\n告诉我的人不是别人，\r\n他就是高级武士。\r\n他的剑术当时已经达到了神的境界。\r\n但是没有任何野心的先生，\r\n从世俗的观念醒悟过来，\r\n只是一个人在离村庄不很远的地方生活。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续","@next_3");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @next_3()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","我发疯似的寻找他，终于找到了他。\r\n我求他三天三夜，成了他的弟子。\r\n但是，自从感觉自己的实力有长进，\r\n我就开始很变得自傲。\r\n师傅叫我做的事情我理都不理，\r\n每天除了喝酒就是玩，\r\n到现在我还很后悔。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续","@next_4");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @next_4()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","到最后师傅也没有抛弃我。\r\n也就是这一点让我更不能忍受。\r\n对过着放荡生活的我，\r\n师傅没有说任何话。\r\n我实在是太对不起师傅，\r\n后来没有留任何话，我就离开了师傅。\r\n到如今还在这里做事。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续","@next_5");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @next_5()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","师傅过隐居生活之前，制造了一把剑。\r\n但是我在没有学到制造这把剑的技术之前，\r\n就过起了腐败的生活，所以我不知道此技术。\r\n现在没脸再去找师傅，\r\n不知你能不能替我找师傅？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","接受","@accept");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","拒绝","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @accept()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            SuperSc.SetGVar(204,1);
Say2Content(t, "text","去找我的师傅交谈吧，\r\n他的家就在森林中的某处。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @kundo()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("命运之书",1)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.SetGVar(211,1);
SuperSc.TakeItem("命运之书",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","啊？这本书是？师傅的命运之书！\r\n师傅还是没有忘了我。\r\n呜呜呜....\r\n我不能就这样呆着， 我要重振师傅的绝世珍品“命运之刃”\r\n你还是以后再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你把命运之书卖到哪儿去了？ \r\n有了命运之书才能制造命运之刃阿!\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @givekundo()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(10)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @rankundo();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","请稍后再回来。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @rankundo()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkjob("warrior")
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checklevel(35)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.ResetGVar(200,20);
SuperSc.SetGVar(205,1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("命运之刃",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","看，是不是很厉害？好好用吧。\r\n是一把和你很相称的剑。\r\n不过我有一个请求，\r\n我从很早以前就开始找一个人，\r\n我只知道他叫刘老头，\r\n帮我找那个人吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }
        }

        public class NpcScript_2Bwe_0103: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +5,+6,+43
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell","@repair"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("木剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("匕首",100,1),
new GoodsItem("乌木剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("青铜剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("短剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("铁剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("青铜斧",100,1),
new GoodsItem("海魂",100,1),
new GoodsItem("半月",100,1),
new GoodsItem("凌风",100,1),
new GoodsItem("鹤嘴锄",100,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","与你这种坏蛋我不想作作生意！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临。请问有什么事情帮忙吗？\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","武器\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","武器\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","修理","@repair");
Say2Content(t, "text","武器\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","询问","@qweapon");
Say2Content(t, "text","有关武器的事\r\n与卫家店");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","对话","@talk");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n往外");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","移动","@tmove");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @tmove()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(4)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("0",345,310);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(4)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("0",344,309);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(4)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("0",334,300);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(4)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("0",334,301);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @tmove();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @buy()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请挑选要购买的物品。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @sell()
      {
        // directs

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main_1");

        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @qweapon()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","店里卖的武器其能力值是定值。\r\n但是妖魔身上的武器，有时根据不同情况，\r\n具有特殊功能。\r\n这种武器拿到店里来，会卖好价钱。\r\n对了，武器的价格按种类不同，其价格也不同，\r\n但是大体上，耐力越高越昂贵。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @talk()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(205,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @end();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(203,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @end();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(202,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @kang();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(201,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @talkwith();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @needgold();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            
      }

      public  void @end()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","与你没有话说...\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @needgold()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金矿",1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你包里发光的是什么？难道是金矿？\r\n是来卖金矿吗？我最近正在开始利用金矿研究新的武器。\r\n所以需要很多金矿，不知你能不能帮我找金矿？\r\n拿金矿来，我会给你好价钱。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main_1");
SuperSc.ResetGVar(201,50);
SuperSc.SetGVar(201,1);
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","跟你没什么话说...\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @talkwith()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金矿",3)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkdura("金矿",15)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","哦，你今天运气不错。\r\n那个金矿看上去品质不错。\r\n但是，今天我没有足够的钱来购买这些金矿，\r\n不知你能不能给我赊账？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","免费","@freegive");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","拒绝","@nogive");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","与你没什么话说...\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @freegive()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金矿",3)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkdura("金矿",10)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金矿",2);
SuperSc.Takecheckitem();
SuperSc.SetGVar(202,1);
Say2Content(t, "text","啊？你真的把这些白给我？\r\n真没想到现如今还有你这样的人，看来还有人情啊。\r\n我不能白拿这么贵重的东西。\r\n你有没有听说过命运之刃？\r\n还有在北门街道小店修理武器之后，有没有仔细看过人？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续","@kang");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }

      public  void @nogive()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","什么？不能那样做？哦，看来年轻人常被人骗过啊。\r\n这么不相信人啊？呵呵...\r\n你如果还这样坚持，以后我也有可能不再和你做交易。\r\n你还坚持拒绝吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","免费","@freegive");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","还是拒绝","@r_nogive");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @r_nogive()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","金矿那么珍贵吗？？ \r\n这样不就没办法了吗？你走吧 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @kang()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","我说的人就是在北门街道铁匠铺做事的铁匠铺老板，\r\n别看他现在在小店做事没什么出息，\r\n曾经可是很有名气的铁匠，\r\n用那时候学到的技术，现在给别人做特殊修理。\r\n你去找一下他吧，我会事先和他讲好的。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
SuperSc.SetGVar(203,1);
      }
        }

        public class NpcScript_2Gwe_0: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +5,+6,+43
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell","@repair"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("木剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("匕首",100,1),
new GoodsItem("乌木剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("青铜剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("短剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("铁剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("青铜斧",100,1),
new GoodsItem("海魂",100,1),
new GoodsItem("半月",100,1),
new GoodsItem("凌风",100,1),
new GoodsItem("鹤嘴锄",100,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","武器\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","武器\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","修理","@repair");
Say2Content(t, "text","武器\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","对话","@quest");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","询问","@qweapon");
Say2Content(t, "text","有关武器的事\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      {

              )

              )

        public class NpcScript_2Mwe_0159: NpcScriptBase
        {

        +5,+6,+43
      };

      "@buy","@sell","@repair"
    };

    {
      new GoodsItem("木剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("匕首",100,1),
new GoodsItem("乌木剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("青铜剑",100,1),

    }
  );

      {

                // 0

              )
            {

      public  void @tmove()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(3)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",328,314);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(3)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",329,315);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(3)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",330,316);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @tmove();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @qweapon()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","店里卖的武器其能力值是定值，\r\n但是妖魔身上的武器，有时根据不同情况，\r\n具有特殊功能。\r\n这种武器拿到店里来，会卖好价钱。\r\n对了，武器的价格按种类不同，其价格也不同，\r\n但是大体上，耐力越高越昂贵。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }
        }
        

        public class NpcScript_2Swe_0120: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +5,+6,+43
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell","@repair"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("木剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("匕首",100,1),
new GoodsItem("乌木剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("青铜剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("短剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("铁剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("青铜斧",100,1),
new GoodsItem("海魂",100,1),
new GoodsItem("半月",100,1),
new GoodsItem("凌风",100,1),
new GoodsItem("鹤嘴锄",100,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","很高兴见到你，有什么可以帮助你的？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","武器\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","武器\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","修理","@repair");
Say2Content(t, "text","武器\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","询问","@qweapon");
Say2Content(t, "text","有关武器的事\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @tmove()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(3)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("2",517,492);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(3)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("2",517,493);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(3)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("2",516,493);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @tmove();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @buy()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","您想买些什么武器？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @sell()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","给我您要卖的武器\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @repair()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","您要修理武器吗？\r\n给我您要修理的武器。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @repair_CB()
      {
        // directs

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");

        public class NpcScript_2Twe_0: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +5,+6,+43
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell","@repair"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("木剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("匕首",100,1),
new GoodsItem("乌木剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("青铜剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("短剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("铁剑",100,1),
new GoodsItem("青铜斧",100,1),
new GoodsItem("海魂",100,1),
new GoodsItem("半月",100,1),
new GoodsItem("凌风",100,1),
new GoodsItem("鹤嘴锄",100,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临，有什么需要的？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","武器\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","武器\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","修理","@repair");
Say2Content(t, "text","武器\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","对话","@quest");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","询问","@qweapon");
Say2Content(t, "text","有关武器的事\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @quest()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(755,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q705();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(754,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q704();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(753,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q703();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @normal();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @q705()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","快去找助理阿妍吧，他有话要和你说。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @q704()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(754,1)
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checklevel(5)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q704_1();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @q704_2();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @q704_2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","您的级别还没有到5，慢慢升级吧，\r\n我会等你升到5级的。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @q704_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","，您升到5级了..\r\n看到您升级，我心里也很开心，\r\n升级了，看来得需要适合您级别的剑，\r\n来，这是青铜剑，会对您升级有帮助的。\r\n好了，现在可以再去找一下助理阿妍了。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
SuperSc.SetGVar(755,1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("青铜剑",1);
      }

      public  void @q703()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checklevel(3)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","，您好！您是听助理阿妍的话来找我的？\r\n嗯，我的要求是等你升级之后来找我..\r\n把级别升到5级就可以了。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","接受","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","请求\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","拒绝","@q703_2");
Say2Content(t, "text","请求\r\n");
SuperSc.SetGVar(754,1);
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","，您好！您是听助理阿妍的话来找我的？\r\n但是您的级别太低了，我没办法给您任务..\r\n等级别升到3之后再来找我吧。\r\n那就祝你好运了\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @q703_2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","等下次机会吧，再见！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

        // ifs

      public  void @sell()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","把你要卖的给我看看，我会给你一个估价。\r\n头盔或帽子在旁边商店，\r\n您可以到那里去看看。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @repair()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","你的衣服看上去很旧了，在这里修补一下？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");

        // ifs

        }
        

        public class NpcScript_3Ahe_0155: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +15
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell","@repair"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("青铜头盔",100,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法头盔",100,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎，我们有各种各样的头盔，\r\n请告诉我你想买哪一种，顺便说一下。\r\n对于");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","OWNERGUILD");
Say2Content(t, "text","的成员是要打20%的折扣的，\r\n因为这个城堡属于 ");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","OWNERGUILD");
Say2Content(t, "text","。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","头盔\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","头盔\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","修补","@repair");
Say2Content(t, "text","头盔\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      {

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      {

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

        public class NpcScript_3Bdr_0106: NpcScriptBase
        {

      };

      "@buy","@sell","@repair"
    };

    {

    }
  );

      public  void @talkwith_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(114,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @eppuni_sad_story();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(112,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @lover_eppuni();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(108,1)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(109,0)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @talk_eppuni();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.CheckDaytime("day")
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","今天天气真好！\r\n这么好的天气，\r\n就该和男朋友一起出去玩。\r\n");

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","天黑路上小心点，\r\n最近夜晚有强盗在路上胡闹，\r\n要尽快把这些强盗消灭掉。\r\n");
      }

              )

            }

            }

      {

              )

      {

              )

      }

               &&

SuperSc.SetGVar(112,1);
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你真是个好人，\r\n经过附近一定要来我们店喔。\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @lover_eppuni()
      {
        // directs

              )

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(5)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","哥哥，我现在很疲劳...\r\n真对不起，我没有办法听你讲。\r\n\r\n");

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }

               && 
                // 0,0

              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","哥哥，我现在很疲劳...\r\n真对不起，我没有办法听你讲。\r\n\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","把身上带着的戒指当作礼物送","@give_my_ring");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","哥哥，你来得正好，我正觉得无聊。\r\n给我讲有趣的故事吧，\r\n好吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","讲沃玛打饱嗝的故事","@talk_about_oma");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

      // break
      return;
      }

      public  void @give_my_necklace()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkitemw_wears("NECKLACE")
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItemw_wears("NECKLACE");

      // goto
      @thanks_neckl();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","哥哥也真会说笑话,\r\n不过有这句话，我就已经很感谢了...\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @thanks_neckl()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(5)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.SetGVar(113,1);
Say2Content(t, "text","哥哥，你竟然给我这样的礼物，太好了！\r\n我好像又有力气了。\r\n");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","哥哥，你竟然给我这样的礼物，太好了！\r\n我好像又有力气了。\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @give_my_ring()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkitemw_wears("RING")
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItemw_wears("RING");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","哥哥也真会说笑话，\r\n不过有这句话，我就已经很感谢了...\r\n");
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Istakeitem("骷髅戒指")
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @eppuni_stroy_1();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @thanks_ring();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @thanks_ring()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","真的吗？真的把这个给我吗？\r\n哥哥，亲你一下...\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @eppuni_stroy_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","呜呜呜呜呜...\r\n..............................\r\n真谢谢你.. 把这么好的戒指给我...\r\n...........\r\n对不起。突然身体不舒服...\r\n");
SuperSc.SetGVar(114,1);
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @eppuni_sad_story()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","哥哥，今天不怎么想说话。\r\n对不起...下次再来吧...\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }
        }
        

        public class NpcScript_3Drapers_shop1_0: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +10,+11,+15
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","传奇大陆广阔无垠，不认识路是正常的。比奇的俗话\r\n说：\"路在嘴上\"，只要你问问我就知道了！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","坐标","@xy");
Say2Content(t, "text","询问\r\n关于");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","PK","@pk");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "text","太慢？\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","想瞬间移动","@talkwith");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @xy()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","比奇最大的城市就是你所在的比奇城，坐标就不用我说了吧！\r\n毒蛇山谷的小村很好找，你只要往500 500 的坐标走就能够\r\n到了。不过，如果你要到盟重土城，就应该牢记300 300\r\n这个数字， 他会指引你走到那里。离流放地很近的沙巴克，是\r\n一个危险的区域，我记得以前在600 300找到它的。不过我要提\r\n醒你，每个省份的坐标都是不同的，可别在比奇找沙巴克哦！\r\n所以，要记住每个通往其他省的关口。\r\n最后，要记得多跟朋友走走，你就会和我一样熟悉这个大陆。\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs

      public  void @pk()
      {
        // directs

      public  void @speed()
      {
        // directs

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @talkwith()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","不要相信什么凌波微步，其实这个东西很\r\n简单，只要你付钱，什么问题不能解决呢？\r\n来吧，小伙子，这个世界充满危险，让我送你\r\n一程吧!\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","向盟重省移动","@move1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","向毒蛇山谷移动","@move2");

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @move1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","我不喜欢一句话说很多次，没有钱的话\r\n你自己应该知道怎么做。去盟重是吧？\r\n4000大洋，一分也不能少。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","移动","@pay1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","不","@talkwith");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @pay1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(4000)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",4000);
SuperSc.MoveMap("3");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你开玩笑吗？你没钱还想移动？\r\n我再也不想见到你了！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @move2()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","移动到毒蛇山谷当然也需要有钱，\r\n总不能免费吧你移动到那儿吧？\r\n去毒蛇山谷需要2000金币。\r\n支付这些钱，移动吗？\r\n\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","不","@talkwith");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

        public class NpcScript_3Gdr_0: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +10,+11,+15
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell","@repair"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("布衣(男)",100,1),
new GoodsItem("布衣(女)",100,1),
new GoodsItem("轻型盔甲(男)",100,1),
new GoodsItem("轻型盔甲(女)",100,1),
new GoodsItem("重盔甲(男)",100,1),
new GoodsItem("重盔甲(女)",100,1),
new GoodsItem("灵魂战衣(男)",100,1),
new GoodsItem("灵魂战衣(女)",100,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法长袍(男)",100,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法长袍(女)",100,1),
new GoodsItem("青铜头盔",100,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法头盔",100,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临，我有什么可以帮助你的？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","衣服\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","衣服\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","修补","@repair");
Say2Content(t, "text","衣服\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      {

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @sell()
      {
        // directs

        public class NpcScript_3Mdr_0149: NpcScriptBase
        {

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +10,+11
      };

      "@buy","@sell","@repair"
    };

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

      public  void @tmove()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(8)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",320,303);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(8)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",320,304);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse

                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(8)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",321,304);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse

                // 0

              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",321,303);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {

            // IfWrap_IfElse

                // 0

              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",310,293);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {

                // 0

              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",310,294);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {

            // IfWrap_IfElse

                // 0

              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",311,294);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {

            // IfWrap_IfElse

                // 0

              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",311,293);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @tmove();
      
            }
            
      }

            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(8)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",321,304);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(8)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",321,303);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(8)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",310,293);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(8)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",310,294);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(8)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",311,294);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(8)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",311,293);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @tmove();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @buy()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","你想修理哪个手套？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");

        public class NpcScript_3Mhe_0149: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +15
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell","@repair"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("青铜头盔",100,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法头盔",100,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      {

Say2Content(t, "text","头盔\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","修补","@repair");
Say2Content(t, "text","头盔\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse

                // 0

              )

              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",320,303);

      return;

              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("3",321,304);

      return;

      };

    {

new GoodsItem("轻型盔甲(女)",100,1),

new GoodsItem("重盔甲(女)",100,1),

    }
  );

      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs

                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {

            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(10)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @quest();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @normal();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @quest()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(306,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q306();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @normal();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @normal()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临，我有什么可以帮助你的？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","衣服\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","衣服\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","修补","@repair");
Say2Content(t, "text","衣服\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @q306()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            SuperSc.SetGVar(307,1);
Say2Content(t, "text","在讲我父亲的事情吗？\r\n我父亲原来在比奇省客栈做生意，\r\n被一群暴徒受欺负。为了散散心，\r\n到沃玛森林去旅游，之后就没有音信。\r\n你可以到那边去找。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @buy()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","你想要买些什么？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @sell()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","让我看看你要出售的衣服，我先给你估个价。\r\n我们也交易头盔。\r\n如果你不需要它们了，请把它们卖给我吧。\r\n\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

        public class NpcScript_4Adm_0153: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +0,+42
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@makedrug"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("黄色药粉(少量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("灰色药粉(少量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("黄色药粉(中量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("灰色药粉(中量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("黄色药粉(大量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("灰色药粉(大量)",200,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","这地方是做药品买卖的，你需要点什么？\r\n当然，如果你要的是可卡因或其他之类精神药品的话，\r\n我们可不卖。\r\n对于");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","OWNERGUILD");
Say2Content(t, "text","的成员我们有20%的折扣，\r\n因为这座城堡是属于");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","OWNERGUILD");
Say2Content(t, "text","的。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","制作","@makedrug");
Say2Content(t, "text","药品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","打听","@helpmakedrug");
Say2Content(t, "text","药品的解释\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @makedrug()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请选择你要制作的药品。\r\n你肯定没忘了带做药的原料，对吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @helpmakedrug()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","这里我们可以做2种药品..\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","灰色药粉","@helpdrug1");

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","灰色药粉","@helpmakedrug1");
Say2Content(t, "text","的成分\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","黄色药粉","@helpmakedrug2");
Say2Content(t, "text","的成分\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

        public class NpcScript_4Adu_0153: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +0,+42
      };

      "@buy","@sell"
    };

    {
      new GoodsItem("金创药(小量)",200,1),

new GoodsItem("魔法药(小)包",200,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns

      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","这里是卖药的...什么？你已经知道了？\r\n哼，好吧，那么买了东西赶紧走吧，能走多快就走多快！\r\n你是");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","OWNERGUILD");

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","药品\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "text","神水\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @quest()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(322,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @num_322();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @no322();
      
            }
            
      }

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }
        }
        

        public class NpcScript_4Bdm_0109: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +0,+42
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@makedrug"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("黄色药粉(少量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("灰色药粉(少量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("黄色药粉(中量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("灰色药粉(中量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("黄色药粉(大量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("灰色药粉(大量)",200,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","你是来炼制什么药的？\r\n\r\n");
