      public  void @talkwith()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkunit(1,0)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @talkwith_1();
      
            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }

      public  void @talkwith_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","哈哈哈， ");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","是个好名字。\r\n我需要5个毒蜘蛛牙齿，能帮我去拿吗？\r\n如果你能拿回来，我会给你好价钱的。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","给5个毒蜘蛛牙齿","@give_st_10");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","下次给找","@i_will_do_next_time");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @give_st_10()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("毒蜘蛛牙齿",5)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("毒蜘蛛牙齿",5);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金币",1500);

      // goto
      @give_st_10_1();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我现在很需要5个毒蜘蛛牙齿，\r\n请不要开玩笑，快帮我找5个。\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @give_st_10_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(103,0)
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(4)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我还有另外一个请求，不知道你能不能答应？\r\n如果答应，那就太感谢了。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","接受请求","@ok_order_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","拒绝请求","@no_order_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
Say2Content(t, "text","谢谢你，我给你一个算300元。\r\n谢谢，欢迎下次再来。\r\n我需要很多毒蜘蛛牙齿，随时都可以拿来。\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @ok_order_1()
      {
        // directs
        SuperSc.GiveItem("药剂师的信",1);
SuperSc.SetGVar(103,1);
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","， 你真是我的好朋友。\r\n我要你帮忙的就是，\r\n把这封信交给在银杏山谷的我的儿子。\r\n在银杏山谷只要提起许中医，无人不知，\r\n拜托了。\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @no_order_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","既然你说没时间，那我也没办法。\r\n下次有时间，就帮我忙吧。\r\n再见!\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @i_will_do_next_time()
      {
        // directs
        
        SuperSc.CloseWindow();
        
        // ifs
        
      }
        }
        

        public class NpcScript_4Bdu_0: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +0,+42
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("金创药(小量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(小量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("金创药(中量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(中量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("强效金创药",200,1),
new GoodsItem("强效魔法药",200,1),
new GoodsItem("超级金创药",200,1),
new GoodsItem("超级魔法药",200,1),
new GoodsItem("金创药(中)包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(中)包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("金创药(小)包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(小)包",200,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎，在这里你可以买一些常见的药品。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","药品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","药品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      {
        // directs

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");

        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @sell()
      {
        // directs

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

        public class NpcScript_4Bdu_0108: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +0,+42
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("金创药(小量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(小量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("金创药(中量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(中量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("强效金创药",200,1),
new GoodsItem("强效魔法药",200,1),
new GoodsItem("超级金创药",200,1),
new GoodsItem("超级魔法药",200,1),
new GoodsItem("金创药(中)包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(中)包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("金创药(小)包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(小)包",200,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临，有什么事情需要我帮忙吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","药品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","药品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","对话","@talkwith");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @tmove()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(2)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("0",326,289);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(2)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("0",327,288);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @tmove();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @buy()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","需要什么东西吗？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");

        // ifs
        
      }

              )

      public  void @talkwith_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(103,1)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(104,0)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临，最近还好，\r\n没有怪物进入村里。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","问有关许中医的事情","@about_her_doctor");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(108,1)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(109,0)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临！最近还好，\r\n没有怪物进入村里。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","问有关刘老头的事情","@about_yu_oldman");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临！最近还好，\r\n没有怪物进入村里。\r\n\r\n");
      }

      public  void @about_her_doctor()
      {

        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @about_yu_oldman()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(3)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","最近有很多人在找刘老头。\r\n看来是许中医在找他。\r\n好好找吧，可能又是躲在什么地方。\r\n");

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(3)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","听说服装店的安氏对刘老头很熟悉，\r\n你可以去找。\r\n");

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","你说刘老头？那个老人最近都没见过，\r\n原本就是一个很怪的老人，\r\n没想到现如今还有人找他。\r\n");
      }
        }

      };

    };

      public  void @talkwith_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(103,1)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(104,0)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(105,0)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @talk_about_letter();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(103,1)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(104,1)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(106,0)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @talk_1_1();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(104,1)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(106,1)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(107,0)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @talk_2_1();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(104,1)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(106,1)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(107,1)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(108,0)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @talk_3_1();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(105,1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","对不起，我现在太忙。\r\n可不可以下次再来？\r\n很抱歉。\r\n");

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","对不起，我现在忙，以后再来找我吧。\r\n");
      }

      public  void @talk_about_letter()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","...就是说你带着我父亲的信件，\r\n因为什么事情给我写信的呢？\r\n快把信交给我。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","传达信件","@give_letter");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","信件丢了","@no_give_letter");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @give_letter()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("药剂师的信",1)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("药剂师的信",1);
SuperSc.SetGVar(104,1);
Say2Content(t, "text","哦，谢谢你作了这件麻烦的事，\r\n你叫什么名字？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","告诉他名字","@say_my_name");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","现在没有信？\r\n你是说在路上丢了？找到之后马上给我。\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @no_give_letter()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","什么？把信丢了？\r\n呵呵，好了，那也用不着这么客气，\r\n这样一来我就变得不好意思了，\r\n好了，没事了，你回去吧。\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @say_my_name()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","谢谢你，让你辛苦了。\r\n这也是缘分，我们友好相处吧。\r\n这是我的一点心意，收下吧。\r\n是叫做强效太阳水的药水，很管用的。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","收下","@ok_take_drug");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @ok_take_drug()
      {
        // directs
        SuperSc.SetGVar(105,1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("强效太阳水",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","以后有时间再来这里找我吧!\r\n再见...\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @talk_1_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","啊");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","，欢迎光临！\r\n你过的还好吗？\r\n现在我需要食人树果实，\r\n如果你帮我弄到几个，我会给你好价钱的。\r\n请你一定帮我。\r\n那我就等你的好消息了。\r\n");
SuperSc.SetGVar(106,1);
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @talk_2_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("食人树果实",1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","还是你好，没有忘记。\r\n拿来的话，就一个一个给吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","给","@give_sg_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @talk_1_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @give_sg_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("食人树果实",1)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("食人树果实",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金币",600);

      // goto
      @check_enough_1();
      
            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }

      public  void @check_enough_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(10)
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.CheckDaytime("sunset")
              )
            {
              SuperSc.SetGVar(107,1);
Say2Content(t, "text","谢谢你");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","现在食人树果实已经够了。\r\n这都是你的功劳。\r\n现在我要开始炼药了，\r\n请你为我祈祷吧。\r\n再见！\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @give_sg_2();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @give_sg_2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("食人树果实",1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @talk_2_1();
      
            }
            else {
              
        SuperSc.CloseWindow();
        
            }
            
      }

      public  void @talk_3_1()
      {
        // directs

              )

            }
            else {

            }
            
      }

      {

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @ok_h_order()
      {

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","接受请求","@ok_h_order_now");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

        // ifs
        
      }
        }
        

        public class NpcScript_4Mdu_0160: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +0,+42
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("金创药(小量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(小量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("金创药(中量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(中量)",200,1),

new GoodsItem("强效魔法药",200,1),

new GoodsItem("超级魔法药",200,1),

new GoodsItem("魔法药(中)包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("金创药(小)包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(小)包",200,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","药品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","药品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","对话","@q318");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @q318()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(321,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q321();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(320,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q320();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(318,1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我之前听陶氏说过你要来，\r\n看来你来是想知道神水...\r\n神水是借助你的内功，\r\n将体力提升到一定程度的药水，\r\n神水的制作方法很简单， \r\n但是制作神水所需要的资料可是很难找的，\r\n其药效也很难判断。 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续","@q318_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(319,1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我之前听陶氏说过你要来，\r\n看来你来是想知道神水...\r\n神水是借助你的内功，\r\n将体力提升到一定程度的药水，\r\n神水的制作方法很简单， \r\n但是制作神水所需要的材料可是很难找的，\r\n其药效也很难判断。 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续","@q318_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我这里卖的东西不多，但是你可以在其中挑一下看看？ \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @q321()
      {

      public  void @q320()
      {
        // directs

                // 0

              )
            {

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
SuperSc.SetGVar(321,1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("体力神水",1);
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","还没到晚上呢，这么快就来了？ 要有耐心才行。\r\n好了，晚上再来吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @q318_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","首先， 要炼神水需要以下材料，\r\n鹿茸 1，鹿血 3，食人树的果实 5，毒蜘蛛牙齿 5，\r\n食人树叶 5，蝎子的尾巴 10，蛆卵 10 \r\n快去准备这些材料吧，只要有材料，我就可以马上给你炼药\r\n你把材料带齐了吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","准备好材料","@q318_1_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","没准备好材料","@q318_1_2");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @q318_1_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("鹿茸",1)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("鹿血",3)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("食人树果实",5)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("毒蜘蛛牙齿",5)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("食人树叶",5)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("蝎子尾巴",10)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("蛆卵",10)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你材料准备得很好。\r\n晚上再来找我怎么样？到时候我把炼好的药给你。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
SuperSc.SetGVar(320,1);
SuperSc.TakeItem("鹿茸",1);
SuperSc.TakeItem("鹿血",3);
SuperSc.TakeItem("食人树果实",5);
SuperSc.TakeItem("毒蜘蛛牙齿",5);
SuperSc.TakeItem("食人树叶",5);
SuperSc.TakeItem("蝎子尾巴",10);
SuperSc.TakeItem("蛆卵",1);
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你准备的材料不齐全， 你知道材料种类，\r\n就快去准备材料吧，我会在这里等你的。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @q318_1_2()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","你准备的材料不齐全， 你知道材料种类，\r\n就快去准备材料吧，我会在这里等你的。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @buy()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","你需要哪些物品？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");

        // ifs
        
      }

      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","让我看看你要出售的物品，我会给你个好价钱。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");

        // ifs
        
      }

      return;

            else {

      return;

              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("2",504,499);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(4)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("2",505,499);

      // break
      return;

            else {

      @tmove();
      
            }

        public class NpcScript_4Tdu_0: NpcScriptBase
        {

    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +0,+42,+30,+3
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {

      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临，有什么可以帮助你的？\r\n\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

        // ifs
        
      }

        public class NpcScript_4Wdm_1006: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +0,+42
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("黄色药粉(中量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("灰色药粉(中量)",200,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","这里是制作和试验各种药品，同时也是教这些的地方，\r\n从不老长生仙丹到剧毒药粉，样样俱全。\r\n药根据使用人不同，可用在善事，也可用在坏事，\r\n一定要记住这一点！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","毒药\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","询问","@explanation");
Say2Content(t, "text","有关毒药的说明\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @buy()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请选择您要购买的毒药。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @explanation()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","毒药一共有两种。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","灰色毒粉","@grey");
Say2Content(t, "text","药效\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","黄色毒粉","@yellow");
Say2Content(t, "text","药效\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @grey()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","灰色毒粉可以降低对方的体力。\r\n只有道士通过施毒术才能使用。\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@explanation");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @yellow()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","黄色毒粉可以降低对方的防御力。\r\n只有道士通过施毒术才能使用。\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@explanation");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }
        }
        

        public class NpcScript_4Wdu_1: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +0,+42,+30,+3
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("金创药(小量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(小量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("金创药(中量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(中量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("强效金创药",200,1),
new GoodsItem("强效魔法药",200,1),
new GoodsItem("超级金创药",200,1),
new GoodsItem("超级魔法药",200,1),
new GoodsItem("金创药(中)包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(中)包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("金创药(小)包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(小)包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("蜡烛",200,1),
new GoodsItem("火把",200,1),
new GoodsItem("地牢逃脱卷",200,1),
new GoodsItem("随机传送卷",200,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临，有什么可以帮助你的？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","对话","@quest");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @quest()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(759,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q709();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(758,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q708();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @normal();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @normal()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","你知道半兽勇士吗？\r\n手拿一个大斧头，\r\n看起来像妖魔...\r\n见到这种怪物，可要当心啊！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @q709()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","替我向那位老人问好，\r\n路上要小心啊...\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @q708()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            SuperSc.SetGVar(759,1);
Say2Content(t, "text","在比奇卖书的老人问候我？\r\n真的吗？？我们的交请很深的...\r\n虽然这片沃玛森林是个很可怕的地方，\r\n但是为了给在这里打猎的人提供药水，我不能离开这里，\r\n麻烦你替我问候老人。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @buy()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","你想要购买哪些物品？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @sell()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","我也收购蜡烛，护身符等杂货。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }
        }
        

        public class NpcScript_4Wdu_1006: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +0,+3,+42
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("金创药(小量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(小量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("金创药(中量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(中量)",200,1),
new GoodsItem("强效金创药",200,1),
new GoodsItem("强效魔法药",200,1),
new GoodsItem("超级金创药",200,1),
new GoodsItem("超级魔法药",200,1),
new GoodsItem("金创药(中)包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(中)包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("金创药(小)包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("魔法药(小)包",200,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","我在这里学药学。 \r\n别人都喜欢学剑术或战术，但是对我来讲学医术救人生命才\r\n是最幸福快乐的事情。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","药品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","药品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      {

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");

        // ifs
        
      }

      {

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }
        }
        

        public class NpcScript_5Bbo_0104: NpcScriptBase

      };

    };

    {
      new GoodsItem("基本剑术",200,1),

    }
  );

      {
        // directs

                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      {
        // directs

      public  void @quest()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse

                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(759,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q709();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(757,1)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.SetGVar(758,1);

      // goto
      @q707();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @normal();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @q709()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","你知道杂货商在哪里了？ 好，谢谢你...\r\n她说她过得很好？好...好啊... \r\n你为了找杂货商，翻遍了沃玛森林了吧。\r\n沃玛森林很适合练级练到15级，\r\n虽然有些废药，但是获得的经验值还算很可观的，\r\n还是在这个适合你能力值的地方打猎吧！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续","@q709_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @q709_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            SuperSc.ResetGVar(750,10);
Say2Content(t, "text","传奇世界有很多山谷和村庄，\r\n慢慢你就会明白的。\r\n不知道这些东西对你有没有用，但是我的一片心意，你就收下吧，\r\n那就祝你好运了！\r\n很多人在找你，希望你多留意我们的话，\r\n再见...\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","谢谢","@q709_2");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @q709_2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkjob("warrior")
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","祝你好运...\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
SuperSc.GiveItem("金创药(小量)",10);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkjob("wizard")
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","祝你好运...\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
SuperSc.GiveItem("魔法药(小量)",10);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkjob("taoist")
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","祝你好运...\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
SuperSc.GiveItem("金创药(小量)",5);
SuperSc.GiveItem("魔法药(小量)",5);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }

      public  void @q707()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","使用武功的方法都不同，法师将鼠标放在怪物身上， \r\n然后再按设定好的武功相应键盘，就可以发功。\r\n道士也使用同样的方法，\r\n但是道士和武士武功之中，基本剑术和精神力战法不需要设定特定 \r\n键盘，因为这些武功是提高");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","的能力值。\r\n好了，这么多武功，一边升级一边慢慢练功，现在先去找杂货商吧 \r\n这条路不好找，我告诉你怎么走... \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续","@q707_1");

        public class NpcScript_5Bichon_bookstore1_0: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +3,+4
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("基本剑术",200,1),
new GoodsItem("攻杀剑",200,1),
new GoodsItem("群体治愈术",200,1),
new GoodsItem("精神力战法",200,1),
new GoodsItem("施毒术",200,1),
new GoodsItem("灵魂火符",200,1),
new GoodsItem("召唤骷髅",200,1),
new GoodsItem("火球术",200,1),
new GoodsItem("抗拒火环",200,1),
new GoodsItem("诱惑之光",200,1),
new GoodsItem("地狱火",200,1),
new GoodsItem("雷电术",200,1),
new GoodsItem("瞬息移动",200,1),
new GoodsItem("大火球",200,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns

      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临，有什么可以帮助你的？\r\n\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");

        public class NpcScript_5Mbo_0161: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] {

      };

      "@buy","@sell"
    };

    {
      new GoodsItem("基本剑术",200,1),
new GoodsItem("攻杀剑术",200,1),
new GoodsItem("群体治愈术",200,1),

    }
  );

      {
        // directs

              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");

    };

        // ifs
        
      }

        public class NpcScript_5Wbo_1004: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("基本剑术",200,1),
new GoodsItem("攻杀剑术",200,1),
new GoodsItem("群体治愈术",200,1),
new GoodsItem("精神力战法",200,1),
new GoodsItem("施毒术",200,1),
new GoodsItem("灵魂火符",200,1),
new GoodsItem("召唤骷髅",200,1),
new GoodsItem("火球术",200,1),
new GoodsItem("抗拒火环",200,1),
new GoodsItem("诱惑之光",200,1),
new GoodsItem("地狱火",200,1),
new GoodsItem("雷电术",200,1),
new GoodsItem("瞬息移动",200,1),
new GoodsItem("大火球",200,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns

      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","这里保存着学徒们需要练学的各种书籍。\r\n当然武功书籍也在其中。你需要什么书？\r\n\r\n");

        public class NpcScript_6Awh_0152: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@storage","@getback"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","有什么事需要我效劳？\r\n目前不收保管费，可随时来保管或取回你的物品。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","保管","@storage");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","找回","@getback");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@mbind");
Say2Content(t, "text","各种卷书和药水\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @storage()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","需要保管什么东西？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @getback()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请看目录决定找什么东西。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @mbind()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","我可以把一些药品打包，这样便可方便携带，\r\n也可以通过我把金条与金币互换.. \r\n你想做些什么？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金币兑换成金条","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金条兑换成金币","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","打包其他物品","@bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
      }

      public  void @changegold()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1000000)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你说你要用金币换成金条？ \r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changegold_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changegold_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1002000)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",1002000);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金条",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","金币已经换好金条了。\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你要把金条换成金币？\r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changemoney_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你的连一根金条都没有还换什么... \r\n想骗我？快滚! \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(4002001)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","您不能将金条兑换成金币，\r\n因为您身上的金币太多了。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @changemoney_2();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金条",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金币",998000);
Say2Content(t, "text","金条已经换好金币了。 \r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }

      public  void @bind()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","我可以捆药水合瞬间移动卷轴， \r\n但是每一捆我需要收取100金币所谓酬劳。 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@p_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","药水 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@z_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","卷轴 \r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @p_bind()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ch_bind1");
Say2Content(t, "text","强效金创药 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ma_bind1");
Say2Content(t, "text","强效魔法药 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ch_bind2");
Say2Content(t, "text","金创药(中量) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ma_bind2");
Say2Content(t, "text","魔法药(中量) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ch_bind3");
Say2Content(t, "text","金创药(小量) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ma_bind3");
Say2Content(t, "text","魔法药(小量)\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@bind");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @z_bind()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@zum_bind1");
Say2Content(t, "text","地牢逃脱卷 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@zum_bind2");

Say2Content(t, "text","回城卷 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@zum_bind4");

        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @ch_bind1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("强效金创药",6)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @ch_bind1_1();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @ch_bind1_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(100)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("强效金创药",6)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",100);
SuperSc.TakeItem("强效金创药",6);
SuperSc.GiveItem("超级金创药",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经捆好了... 我的技术不错吧.. \r\n还有要捆的就拿给我吧..\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续捆","@p_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @ma_bind2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("魔法药(中量)",6)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @ma_bind2_1();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @ma_bind2_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse

                // 0

               && 
                // 0,0

              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",100);

        public class NpcScript_6Bwh_0: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@storage","@getback"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！ \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(10)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @quest();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @normal();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @quest()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(305,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q305();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @normal();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @q305()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            SuperSc.SetGVar(306,1);
Say2Content(t, "text","你在找厨师吗？ \r\n我对厨师也不是很了解。 \r\n但是据说毒蛇山谷的米家服装老板知道此事，\r\n你可以去找他一下。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","关闭","@exit");
      }

      public  void @normal()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","有什么事需要我效劳？\r\n目前不收保管费，可随时来保管或取回你的物品。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","保管","@storage");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","找回","@getback");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@mbind");
Say2Content(t, "text","各种卷书和药水\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @storage()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","需要保管什么东西？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @getback()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请看目录决定找什么东西。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @mbind()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","我可以把一些药品打包，这样便可方便携带，\r\n也可以通过我把金条与金币互换.. \r\n你想做些什么？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金币兑换成金条","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金条兑换成金币","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","打包其他物品","@bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
      }

      public  void @changegold()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1000000)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你说你要用金币换成金条？ \r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changegold_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changegold_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1002000)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",1002000);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金条",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","金币已经换好金条了。\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你要把金条换成金币？\r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你的连一根金条都没有还换什么... \r\n想骗我？快滚! \r\n\r\n");

            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
               && 
                // 0

              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","您不能将金条兑换成金币，\r\n因为您身上的金币太多了。\r\n\r\n");

            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @changemoney_2();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_2()

        // ifs

            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }

            }

        public class NpcScript_6Bwh_0125: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@storage","@getback"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！ \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","有什么事需要我效劳？\r\n目前不收保管费，可随时来保管或取回你的物品。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","保管","@storage");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","找回","@getback");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@mbind");
Say2Content(t, "text","各种卷书和药水\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @storage()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","需要保管什么东西？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @getback()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请看目录决定找什么东西。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @mbind()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","我可以把一些药品打包，这样便可方便携带，\r\n我也可以把金条与金币进行兑换。 \r\n你想做些什么？\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金币兑换成金条","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金条兑换成金币","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","打包其他物品","@bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
      }

      public  void @changegold()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1000000)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你说你要用金币换成金条？ \r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changegold_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changegold_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1002000)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",1002000);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金条",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","金币已经换好金条了。\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你要把金条换成金币？\r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changemoney_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你的连一根金条都没有还换什么... \r\n想骗我？快滚! \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(4002001)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","您不能将金条兑换成金币，\r\n因为您身上的金币太多了。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @changemoney_2();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金条",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金币",998000);
Say2Content(t, "text","金条已经换好金币了。 \r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }

      public  void @bind()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","我可以捆药水合瞬间移动卷轴， \r\n但是每一捆我需要收取100金币所谓酬劳。 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@p_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","药水 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@z_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","卷轴 \r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @p_bind()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ch_bind1");
Say2Content(t, "text","强效金创药 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ma_bind1");
Say2Content(t, "text","强效魔法药 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ch_bind2");
Say2Content(t, "text","金创药(中量) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ma_bind2");
Say2Content(t, "text","魔法药(中量) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ch_bind3");
Say2Content(t, "text","金创药(小量) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ma_bind3");
Say2Content(t, "text","魔法药(小量)\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@bind");
        // ifs
        
      }

        // ifs
        
      }

            }

            }
            
      }

      public  void @ch_bind1_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0

               && 
                // 0,0

              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",100);

      public  void @goldbarmenu()
      {
        // directs

Say2Content(t, "text","金条打包成金盒 (12000 金币) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@exchangegoldbarbundle");
Say2Content(t, "text","金砖兑换金条 (免费) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@exhangechesttobundles");
Say2Content(t, "text","金盒兑换金砖 (免费) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@exhangechesttobars");
Say2Content(t, "text","金盒兑换金条 (免费) \r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @makegoldbarbundle()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",5)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @金砖_1();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所5根以上的金条或足够的金币， \r\n请准备好所需的物品再来找我。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @金砖_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(6000)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",5)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",6000);
SuperSc.TakeItem("金条",5);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金砖",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经换好了，\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续捆","@makegoldbarbundle");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所5根以上的金条或足够的金币， \r\n请准备好所需的物品再来找我。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @exchangegoldbarbundle()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金砖",1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @exchangegoldbarbundle_1();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没金砖，让我怎么帮你兑换？ \r\n你不会是想骗我吧！ \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所5根以上的金条或足够的金币， \r\n请准备好所需的物品再来找我。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      {

              )

        public class NpcScript_6Ewh_D002: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@storage","@getback"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(5)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @quest();
      
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @normal();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @quest()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(356,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q356();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(355,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q355();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(354,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q354();
      

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(353,1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @q353();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","goto @normal");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @normal()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","有什么事需要我效劳？\r\n目前不收保管费，可随时来保管或取回你的物品。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","保管","@storage");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","找回","@getback");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @q353()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","你真够厉害的，真厉害！\r\n竟然想骗恶名远洋的商人崔氏？\r\n胆子不小啊，\r\n你不会是连我都想骗吧？\r\n不过以你的性格骗我还没那么容易，哼！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","欺骗","@q353_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

      }

      public  void @q353_1()
      {
        // directs

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","快点拿来，实在是不能再等了。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

            }

        public class NpcScript_6Gwh_0: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@storage","@getback"
    }; 
    
          // goods

    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！ \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","有什么事需要我效劳？\r\n目前不收保管费，可随时来保管或取回你的物品。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","保管","@storage");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","找回","@getback");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@mbind");
Say2Content(t, "text","各种卷书和药水\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @storage()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","需要保管什么东西？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");

      }

      {
        // directs

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @mbind()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","我可以把一些药品打包，这样便可方便携带，\r\n也可以通过我把金条与金币互换.. \r\n你想做些什么？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金币兑换成金条","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金条兑换成金币","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","打包其他物品","@bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
      }

      public  void @changegold()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1000000)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你说你要用金币换成金条？ \r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changegold_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changegold_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1002000)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",1002000);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金条",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","金币已经换好金条了。\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@exit");
            }

            }
            
      }

            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @ma_bind1_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(100)
               && 
                // 0,0

              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",100);

        public class NpcScript_6Mwh_0145: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@storage","@getback"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！ \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","有什么事需要我效劳？\r\n目前不收保管费，可随时来保管或取回你的物品。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","保管","@storage");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","找回","@getback");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@mbind");
Say2Content(t, "text","各种卷书和药水\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @storage()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","需要保管什么东西？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @getback()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请看目录决定找什么东西。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @mbind()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","我可以把一些药品打包，这样便可方便携带，\r\n也可以通过我把金条与金币互换.. \r\n你想做些什么？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金币兑换成金条","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金条兑换成金币","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","打包其他物品","@bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
      }

      public  void @changegold()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1000000)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你说你要用金币换成金条？ \r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changegold_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changegold_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1002000)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",1002000);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金条",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","金币已经换好金条了。\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你要把金条换成金币？\r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changemoney_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你的连一根金条都没有还换什么... \r\n想骗我？快滚! \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(4002001)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","您不能将金条兑换成金币，\r\n因为您身上的金币太多了。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @changemoney_2();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金条",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金币",998000);
Say2Content(t, "text","金条已经换好金币了。 \r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }

      public  void @bind()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","我可以捆药水合瞬间移动卷轴， \r\n但是每一捆我需要收取100金币所谓酬劳。 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@p_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","药水 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@z_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","卷轴 \r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @p_bind()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ch_bind1");
Say2Content(t, "text","强效金创药 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ma_bind1");
Say2Content(t, "text","强效魔法药 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ch_bind2");
Say2Content(t, "text","金创药(中量) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ma_bind2");
Say2Content(t, "text","魔法药(中量) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ch_bind3");
Say2Content(t, "text","金创药(小量) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ma_bind3");
Say2Content(t, "text","魔法药(小量)\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@bind");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @z_bind()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@zum_bind1");
Say2Content(t, "text","地牢逃脱卷 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@zum_bind2");
Say2Content(t, "text","随机传送卷 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@zum_bind3");
Say2Content(t, "text","回城卷 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@zum_bind4");
Say2Content(t, "text","行会回城卷 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@bind");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @ch_bind1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("强效金创药",6)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @ch_bind1_1();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @ch_bind1_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(100)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("强效金创药",6)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",100);
SuperSc.TakeItem("强效金创药",6);
SuperSc.GiveItem("超级金创药",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经捆好了... 我的技术不错吧.. \r\n还有要捆的就拿给我吧..\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续捆","@p_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
