        public class NpcScript_6Mwh_3: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@storage","@getback"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！ \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","有什么事需要我效劳？\r\n目前不收保管费，可随时来保管或取回你的物品。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","保管","@storage");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","找回","@getback");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@mbind");
Say2Content(t, "text","各种卷书和药水\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @storage()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","需要保管什么东西？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @getback()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请看目录决定找什么东西。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @mbind()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","我可以把一些药品打包，这样便可方便携带，\r\n也可以通过我把金条与金币互换.. \r\n你想做些什么？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金币兑换成金条","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金条兑换成金币","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","打包其他物品","@bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
      }

      public  void @changegold()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1000000)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你说你要用金币换成金条？ \r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changegold_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changegold_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1002000)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",1002000);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金条",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","金币已经换好金条了。\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你要把金条换成金币？\r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changemoney_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你的连一根金条都没有还换什么... \r\n想骗我？快滚! \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(4002001)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","您不能将金条兑换成金币，\r\n因为您身上的金币太多了。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @changemoney_2();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金条",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金币",998000);
Say2Content(t, "text","金条已经换好金币了。 \r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }

      public  void @bind()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","我可以捆药水合瞬间移动卷轴， \r\n但是每一捆我需要收取100金币所谓酬劳。 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@p_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","药水 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@z_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","卷轴 \r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @p_bind()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ch_bind1");
Say2Content(t, "text","强效金创药 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ma_bind1");
Say2Content(t, "text","强效魔法药 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ch_bind2");
Say2Content(t, "text","金创药(中量) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ma_bind2");
Say2Content(t, "text","魔法药(中量) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ch_bind3");
Say2Content(t, "text","金创药(小量) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ma_bind3");
Say2Content(t, "text","魔法药(小量)\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@bind");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @z_bind()
      {

        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @ch_bind1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse

                // 0,0

              )
            {

      @ch_bind1_1();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @ch_bind1_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(100)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("强效金创药",6)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",100);
SuperSc.TakeItem("强效金创药",6);
SuperSc.GiveItem("超级金创药",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经捆好了... 我的技术不错吧.. \r\n还有要捆的就拿给我吧..\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续捆","@p_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

        public class NpcScript_6Swh_2: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@storage","@getback"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！ \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","取消","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","需要帮什么忙吗？\r\n目前不收保管费，请多利用。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","保管","@storage");
Say2Content(t, "text","东西\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","找回","@getback");
Say2Content(t, "text","东西\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@mbind");
Say2Content(t, "text","各种卷书和药水\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","关闭","@exit");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @storage()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","需要保管什么东西？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @getback()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请看目录决定找什么东西。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @mbind()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","你知道我是什么人吗？ \r\n我做的是这样的事情... \r\n你要试一下吗？有什么要拜托的就说吧 \r\n\r\n用金币");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","交换","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","金条 \r\n用金条");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","交换","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","金币 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","取消","@exit");
      }

      public  void @changegold()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1000000)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你说你要用金币换成金条？ \r\n好的，我帮你换 \r\n但是要支付手续费 \r\n费用是2000金币，你还换吗？ \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","交换","@changegold_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","取消","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？ \r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changegold_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1002000)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",1002000);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金条",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","金币已经换好金条了。 \r\n还换吗？ \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","交换","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","取消","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你的包里东西已经满了，或者你没有足够的钱支付手续费\r\n你再确认一下吧 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","取消","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney()
      {

            }
            else {

            }
            
      }

            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @changemoney_2();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @bind()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","目前我能捆的只有卷书和药水 \r\n你要捆吗？ \r\n要捆东西需要100金币。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@p_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","药水 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@z_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","卷书 \r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

              )

            }

            }
            
      }

      public  void @ch_bind1_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0

               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("强效金创药",6)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",100);
SuperSc.TakeItem("强效金创药",6);
SuperSc.GiveItem("超级金创药",1);

            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你都没有钱捆东西，\r\n还捆什么？ \r\n快走吧.... \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }

        public class NpcScript_6Twh_0140: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@storage","@getback"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！ \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","有什么事需要我效劳？\r\n目前不收保管费，可随时来保管或取回你的物品。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","保管","@storage");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","找回","@getback");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@mbind");
Say2Content(t, "text","各种卷书和药水\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @storage()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","需要保管什么东西？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @getback()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请看目录决定找什么东西。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @mbind()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","我可以把一些药品打包，这样便可方便携带，\r\n也可以通过我把金条与金币互换.. \r\n你想做些什么？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金币兑换成金条","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金条兑换成金币","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","打包其他物品","@bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
      }

      public  void @changegold()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1000000)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你说你要用金币换成金条？ \r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changegold_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changegold_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1002000)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",1002000);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金条",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","金币已经换好金条了。\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你要把金条换成金币？\r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changemoney_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你的连一根金条都没有还换什么... \r\n想骗我？快滚! \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(4002001)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","您不能将金条兑换成金币，\r\n因为您身上的金币太多了。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @changemoney_2();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金条",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金币",998000);
Say2Content(t, "text","金条已经换好金币了。 \r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }

      public  void @bind()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","我可以捆药水合瞬间移动卷轴， \r\n但是每一捆我需要收取100金币所谓酬劳。 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@p_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","药水 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@z_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","卷轴 \r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @p_bind()
      {
        // directs

Say2Content(t, "text","强效魔法药 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ch_bind2");
Say2Content(t, "text","金创药(中量) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ma_bind2");
Say2Content(t, "text","魔法药(中量) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ch_bind3");
Say2Content(t, "text","金创药(小量) \r\n");

Say2Content(t, "text","魔法药(小量)\r\n");

        // ifs
        
      }

      }

      public  void @ch_bind1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("强效金创药",6)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @ch_bind1_1();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @ch_bind1_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(100)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("强效金创药",6)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",100);
SuperSc.TakeItem("强效金创药",6);
SuperSc.GiveItem("超级金创药",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经捆好了... 我的技术不错吧.. \r\n还有要捆的就拿给我吧..\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续捆","@p_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的卷轴或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的卷轴跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @zum_bind4()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("行会回城卷",6)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @zum_bind4_1();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的卷轴或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的卷轴跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @zum_bind4_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(100)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("行会回城卷",6)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",100);
SuperSc.TakeItem("行会回城卷",6);
SuperSc.GiveItem("行会回城卷包",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经捆好了... 我的技术不错吧！ \r\n还有要捆的就拿给我吧..\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续捆","@z_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的卷轴或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的卷轴跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }
        }
        

        public class NpcScript_6Wrt_1002: NpcScriptBase
        {

    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(403,1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","贫道就是这个道馆的馆长 '破关号'。 \r\n见到像你这样年少气盛的勇士，想起了很久以前我年轻时候\r\n的事情。其中，一想到 '季正'，我就热血沸腾！ \r\n哦，你可能太年轻不了解此事。 \r\n你想听季正的故事吗？ \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","听","@hear");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","不听","@nohear");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(402,1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你打败幻影蜘蛛胜利归来，祝贺你。\r\n我现在告诉你所想知道的事情。 \r\n\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(401,1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你还没有打败幻影蜘蛛， \r\n在打败幻影蜘蛛之前， \r\n我不能告诉你这个秘密。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","关闭","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.CheckGVar(400,0)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","贫道就是这个道馆的馆长 '破关号'。 \r\n见到像你这样年少气盛的勇士，想起了很久以前我年轻时候\r\n的事情。其中，一想到 '季正'，我就热血沸腾！\r\n哦，你可能太年轻不了解此事。 \r\n你想听季正的故事吗？ \r\n\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","看来施主您对以前的事情很感兴趣。 \r\n好，你想知道什么？ \r\n\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

        public class NpcScript_6Wwh_11: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@storage","@getback"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","贫道是本舍舍监。 教学徒集体生活规则 \r\n没有地方存放东西？ 嗯~ 这样好了 \r\n我先暂时替你保管。 \r\n最近志愿道士的人较少，有不少空房。 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","保管","@storage");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","找回","@getback");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@mbind");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @storage()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","需要保管什么东西？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @getback()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请看目录决定找什么东西。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @mbind()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","我可以把一些药品打包，这样便可方便携带，\r\n我也可以把金条与金币进行兑换。 \r\n你想做些什么？\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金币兑换成金条","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金条兑换成金币","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","金砖或金盒兑换","@goldbarmenu");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","打包其他物品","@bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
      }

      public  void @changegold()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1000000)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你说你要用金币换成金条？ \r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changegold_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changegold_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1002000)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",1002000);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金条",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","金币已经换好金条了。\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你要把金条换成金币？\r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changemoney_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你的连一根金条都没有还换什么... \r\n想骗我？快滚! \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(4002001)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","您不能将金条兑换成金币，\r\n因为您身上的金币太多了。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @changemoney_2();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金条",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金币",998000);
Say2Content(t, "text","金条已经换好金币了。 \r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }

      public  void @bind()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","我可以捆药水合瞬间移动卷轴， \r\n但是每一捆我需要收取100金币所谓酬劳。 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@p_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","药水 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@z_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","卷轴 \r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

Say2Content(t, "text","魔法药(小量)\r\n");

      public  void @ch_bind1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("强效金创药",6)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @ch_bind1_1();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @ch_bind1_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(100)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("强效金创药",6)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",100);
SuperSc.TakeItem("强效金创药",6);
SuperSc.GiveItem("超级金创药",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经捆好了... 我的技术不错吧.. \r\n还有要捆的就拿给我吧..\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续捆","@p_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @makegoldbarbundle()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",5)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @金砖_1();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所5根以上的金条或足够的金币， \r\n请准备好所需的物品再来找我。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @金砖_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(6000)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",5)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",6000);
SuperSc.TakeItem("金条",5);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金砖",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经换好了，\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续捆","@makegoldbarbundle");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所5根以上的金条或足够的金币， \r\n请准备好所需的物品再来找我。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @exchangegoldbarbundle()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金砖",1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @exchangegoldbarbundle_1();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没金砖，让我怎么帮你兑换？ \r\n你不会是想骗我吧！ \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @exchangegoldbarbundle_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs

              )

            }

        public class NpcScript_7Ast_3: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +30,+3,+25
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("蜡烛",200,1),
new GoodsItem("火把",200,1),
new GoodsItem("火炬",200,1),
new GoodsItem("地牢逃脱卷",200,1),
new GoodsItem("地牢逃脱卷包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("随机传送卷",200,1),
new GoodsItem("随机传送卷包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("修复油",200,1),
new GoodsItem("行会回城卷",200,1),
new GoodsItem("行会回城卷包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("护身符",200,1),
new GoodsItem("护身符包",200,1),
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","杂货店的定义是什么？它意味着什么东西都卖，\r\n让我们按你的意愿给你必要的物品。 \r\n按这个城堡领主的命令我们给行会成员八折的优惠！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @buy()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","我们出售蜡烛，护身符，卷轴，修理液等，\r\n另外，行会回城卷仅供行会成员使用。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @sell()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","人们出售各种物品...\r\n世道艰难啊， 唉，选择你要出售的物品吧...\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }
        }

        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            SuperSc.TakeItemw_normal("斩马刀",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金币",100);
SuperSc.SetGVar(353,1);
Say2Content(t, "text","哈哈，你的斩马刀是什么东西？\r\n难道你想用这把斩马刀来欺骗我？算了，\r\n我就勉强收下把，但是我不能白要你的东西，\r\n给你100金币吧，你得谢谢我啊。 \r\n还有，有时间去半兽古墓一趟，\r\n找到那里的仓库保管员，他会帮助你的。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @q353()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","快去半兽古墓找仓库保管员吧。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @buy()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","你想要购买哪些物品？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @sell()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","我们出售各种照明物品，武器，盔甲，卷轴，修复油，\r\n药水等物品。\r\n\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs

        public class NpcScript_7Gst_0: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +30,+3
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("蜡烛",200,1),
new GoodsItem("火把",200,1),
new GoodsItem("火炬",200,1),
new GoodsItem("地牢逃脱卷",200,1),
new GoodsItem("地牢逃脱卷包",200,1),
new GoodsItem("随机传送卷",200,1),

new GoodsItem("行会回城卷",200,1),
new GoodsItem("护身符",200,1),
new GoodsItem("护身符包",200,1),
    }
  );

      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！ \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临，有什么可以帮助你的？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
        // ifs

      "@buy","@sell","@repair"
    };

    {

    }
  );

        // directs

              )
            {

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +20,+19,+21
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@buy","@sell","@repair"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      new GoodsItem("金项链",200,1),
new GoodsItem("传统项链",200,1),

new GoodsItem("凤凰明珠",200,1),
    }
  );

      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse

                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkpkpoint(2)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs

Say2Content(t, "text","项链\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @tmove()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(4)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("0",306,276);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(4)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("0",306,277);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(4)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("0",296,286);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(4)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("0",297,285);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @tmove();
      
            }
            
      }

              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不想和你这样的人打交道！ \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临，有什么可以帮助你的？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","购买","@buy");
Say2Content(t, "text","项链\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","出售","@sell");
Say2Content(t, "text","项链\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","修理","@repair");
Say2Content(t, "text","项链\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @buy()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","你想要哪条项链？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @sell()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请吧要出售的项链交给我。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @repair()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请把要修理的项链放在这里。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @repair_CB()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","这项链现在已经像新的一样了。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

        public class NpcScript_9Aup_0151: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        +5,+6
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@upgradenow","@getbackupgnow"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","没有一个人来光顾。顾客，请进！\r\n我的自尊使我不允许对这个物品的价格再要求打折了。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","开始武器升级","@upgrade");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回武器升级","@getbackupgnow");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","听更多的歌","@heardsing");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @upgrade()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","你像是想要升级你的武器\r\n给我看你的武器，升级价格是");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","UPGRADEWEAPONFEE");
Say2Content(t, "text","金币。\r\n修炼这个武器需要原料");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","黑铁矿","@biron");
Say2Content(t, "text","，");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","饰品","@etc");
Say2Content(t, "text","，");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","武器","@weapon");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n和");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","金币","@gold");
Say2Content(t, "text","。你确定有它们吗？\r\n别的原料你可以使用你包内的物品。\r\n你想委托你的武器进入修炼系统吗？\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","确认修炼","@confirmupgrade");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","取消","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @biron()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","你可以在矿山里采到黑铁矿。\r\n如果你想修炼过程得到一个好得结果，\r\n你最好拿给我更高纯度的黑铁矿。\r\n顺便请记得，在修炼期间如果没有足够数\r\n量的黑色铁矿，那怕你的矿石纯度再高，\r\n修练的结果也可能不好。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@upgrade");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @etc()
      {
        // directs

        // ifs

      }

        public class NpcScript_9Ech_0126: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@storage","@getback"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","有什么事需要我效劳？\r\n目前不收保管费，可随时来保管或取回你的物品。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","保管","@storage");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","找回","@getback");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@mbind");
Say2Content(t, "text","各种卷书和药水\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @storage()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","需要保管什么东西？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @getback()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请看目录决定找什么东西。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @mbind()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","我可以把一些药品打包，这样便可方便携带，\r\n我也可以把金条与金币进行兑换。 \r\n你想做些什么？\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金币兑换成金条","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金条兑换成金币","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","金砖或金盒兑换","@goldbarmenu");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","打包其他物品","@bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
      }

      public  void @changegold()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1000000)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你说你要用金币换成金条？ \r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changegold_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changegold_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1002000)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",1002000);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金条",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","金币已经换好金条了。\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你要把金条换成金币？\r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changemoney_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你的连一根金条都没有还换什么... \r\n想骗我？快滚! \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(4002001)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","您不能将金条兑换成金币，\r\n因为您身上的金币太多了。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @changemoney_2();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金条",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金币",998000);
Say2Content(t, "text","金条已经换好金币了。 \r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }

              )
            {

            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");

            }

      public  void @ch_bind1_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(100)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("强效金创药",6)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",100);
SuperSc.TakeItem("强效金创药",6);
SuperSc.GiveItem("超级金创药",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经捆好了... 我的技术不错吧.. \r\n还有要捆的就拿给我吧..\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续捆","@p_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      }

      public  void @makegoldbarbundle()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",5)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @金砖_1();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所5根以上的金条或足够的金币， \r\n请准备好所需的物品再来找我。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @金砖_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(6000)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",5)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",6000);
SuperSc.TakeItem("金条",5);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金砖",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经换好了，\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续捆","@makegoldbarbundle");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所5根以上的金条或足够的金币， \r\n请准备好所需的物品再来找我。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @exhangechesttobundles_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金盒",1)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金盒",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金砖",2);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经换好了，\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续换","@exhangechesttobundles");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不能再帮你兑换了，\r\n因为你的包裹里连一个空格都没有。\r\n先去把你包裹里的物品清理一下，最好留出10个以上位置， \r\n如果空间不够，金条或金砖有可能会掉落在地上。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

            }
            
      }
        }
        

        public class NpcScript_9Ech_0146: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@storage","@getback"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","有什么事需要我效劳？\r\n目前不收保管费，可随时来保管或取回你的物品。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","保管","@storage");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","找回","@getback");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@mbind");
Say2Content(t, "text","各种卷书和药水\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @storage()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","需要保管什么东西？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @getback()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请看目录决定找什么东西。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @mbind()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","我可以把一些药品打包，这样便可方便携带，\r\n我也可以把金条与金币进行兑换。 \r\n你想做些什么？\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金币兑换成金条","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金条兑换成金币","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","金砖或金盒兑换","@goldbarmenu");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","打包其他物品","@bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
      }

      public  void @changegold()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1000000)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你说你要用金币换成金条？ \r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changegold_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changegold_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1002000)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",1002000);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金条",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","金币已经换好金条了。\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你要把金条换成金币？\r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changemoney_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你的连一根金条都没有还换什么... \r\n想骗我？快滚! \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(4002001)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","您不能将金条兑换成金币，\r\n因为您身上的金币太多了。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @changemoney_2();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_2()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",1)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金条",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金币",998000);
Say2Content(t, "text","金条已经换好金币了。 \r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }

      public  void @bind()
      {
        // directs

Say2Content(t, "text","药水 \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@z_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","卷轴 \r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      {

Say2Content(t, "text","金创药(中量) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ma_bind2");
Say2Content(t, "text","魔法药(中量) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@ch_bind3");

Say2Content(t, "text","魔法药(小量)\r\n");

        // ifs
        
      }

      {

      }

      public  void @ch_bind1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("强效金创药",6)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @ch_bind1_1();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @ch_bind1_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(100)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("强效金创药",6)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",100);
SuperSc.TakeItem("强效金创药",6);
SuperSc.GiveItem("超级金创药",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经捆好了... 我的技术不错吧.. \r\n还有要捆的就拿给我吧..\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续捆","@p_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

        public class NpcScript_9Ech_0152: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      "@storage","@getback"
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","有什么事需要我效劳？\r\n目前不收保管费，可随时来保管或取回你的物品。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","保管","@storage");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","找回","@getback");
Say2Content(t, "text","物品\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","捆","@mbind");
Say2Content(t, "text","各种卷书和药水\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @storage()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","需要保管什么东西？\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @getback()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","请看目录决定找什么东西。\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @mbind()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","我可以把一些药品打包，这样便可方便携带，\r\n我也可以把金条与金币进行兑换。 \r\n你想做些什么？\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金币兑换成金条","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","将金条兑换成金币","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","金砖或金盒兑换","@goldbarmenu");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","打包其他物品","@bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
      }

      public  void @changegold()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1000000)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你说你要用金币换成金条？ \r\n但是你需要支付我2000金币的费用 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@changegold_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你连这点钱都没有，还换什么？\r\n等你有足够的钱，再来找我吧。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changegold_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1002000)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",1002000);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金条",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","金币已经换好金条了。\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续兑换","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@exit");
            }
            else {

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
            }
            
      }

               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("强效魔法药",6)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",100);
SuperSc.TakeItem("强效魔法药",6);
SuperSc.GiveItem("超级魔法药",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经捆好了... 我的技术不错吧.. \r\n还有要捆的就拿给我吧..\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续捆","@p_bind");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所需的药品或金币， \r\n等你准备好需要的药品跟金币再来找我吧。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @goldbarmenu()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@makegoldbarbundle");
Say2Content(t, "text","金条打包成金砖 (6000 金币) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@makegoldchestgoldbarbundle");
Say2Content(t, "text","金砖打包成金盒(6000 金币) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@makegoldchestgoldbars");
Say2Content(t, "text","金条打包成金盒 (12000 金币) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@exchangegoldbarbundle");
Say2Content(t, "text","金砖兑换金条 (免费) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@exhangechesttobundles");
Say2Content(t, "text","金盒兑换金砖 (免费) \r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","兑换","@exhangechesttobars");
Say2Content(t, "text","金盒兑换金条 (免费) \r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @makegoldbarbundle()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",5)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @金砖_1();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所5根以上的金条或足够的金币， \r\n请准备好所需的物品再来找我。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @金砖_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(6000)
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金条",5)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",6000);
SuperSc.TakeItem("金条",5);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金砖",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经换好了，\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续捆","@makegoldbarbundle");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没有所5根以上的金条或足够的金币， \r\n请准备好所需的物品再来找我。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      {
        // directs

      public  void @exhangechesttobundles_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金盒",1)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金盒",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金砖",2);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经换好了，\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续换","@exhangechesttobundles");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不能再帮你兑换了，\r\n因为你的包裹里连一个空格都没有。\r\n先去把你包裹里的物品清理一下，最好留出10个以上位置， \r\n如果空间不够，金条或金砖有可能会掉落在地上。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @exhangechesttobars()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金盒",1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @exhangechesttobars_1();
      
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你没金盒，让我怎么帮你兑换？ \r\n你不会是想骗我吧！ \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @exhangechesttobars_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("金盒",1)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金盒",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金条",10);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经换好了，\r\n还要继续兑换吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","继续换","@exhangechesttobars");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","我不能再帮你兑换了，\r\n因为你的包裹里连一个空格都没有。\r\n先去把你包裹里的物品清理一下，最好留出10个以上位置， \r\n如果空间不够，金条或金砖有可能会掉落在地上。\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","离开","@exit");
            }
            
      }
        }
        

        public class NpcScript_9Ega_0101: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎来到我的赌场，你想进来玩几把吗？\r\n你好？你想进赌场吗？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","确认","@pre");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","退出","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @pre()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(3)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("B10",17,17);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(3)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("B10",17,61);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(3)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveMapPos("B10",67,31);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @pre();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @leave()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","你知道的，每当有人想浪费我宝贵的时间我都会大发雷霆，为此，\r\n你要受到一个小小的惩罚！\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","错了..","@move");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @move()
      {
        // directs
        SuperSc.MoveMap("move");
Say2Content(t, "text","101mapmove 101mapmove 101mapmove 101mapmove 101mapmove 101mapmove 101mapmove 101mapmove 101mapmove 101mapmove Q4mapmove 101mapmove 101mapmove 101mapmove 101mapmove 101mapmove 101mapmove 101 7 8goto @finish");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @finish()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","Alright，Now bugger off\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","Im going!","@tele");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
        // ifs
        
      }

      public  void @tele()
      {
        // directs
        SuperSc.MoveMapPos("0",291,295);
        // ifs
        
      }
        }
        

        public class NpcScript_9Ega_B010: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","您知道我是做什么事情的么？\r\n我给你说说我做什么事情的吧...\r\n我是卖筹码的啦，每个筹码是1000金币，\r\n筹码包是6000金币的哦。\r\n想试试么？如果你有什么要求可以跟我说。\r\n用金币 ");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","交换筹码","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n用筹码 ");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","交换金币","@changemoney");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n用金币 ");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","交换筹码包","@changetupe");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","退出","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
      }

      public  void @changegold()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1000)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你希望用金币交换筹码么？\r\n为了给生活一点刺激，我可以给你交换筹码。\r\n可是你总得给我点手续费吧。\r\n手续费是100金币。你还想交换么？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","交换","@changegold_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","退出","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","连这点钱都没有，怎么出来混啊？ \r\n等您有了钱再来找我吧，呵呵。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changegold_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(1100)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",1100);
SuperSc.GiveItem("筹码",1);
Say2Content(t, "text","已经换好啦。\r\n还要换么？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","交换","@changegold");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","退出","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你的包裹已经满了，你让我怎么给你交换啊! 您确认一下啊!\r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","退出","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("筹码",1)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你想用筹码换钱么？\r\n为了给你生活一点依靠，我是愿意为你效劳的啦，\r\n可是，还是老规矩，手续费总是免不了的呀。\r\n手续费是100金币，你还要换么？\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","交换","@changemoney_1");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","退出","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","哼哼，想骗我，你根本就没有筹码啦？\r\n少来这一套啦! \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","退出","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      {
        // directs

              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @changemoney_2();
      
            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changemoney_2()
      {

        // ifs

                // 0,0

              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("筹码",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("金币",900);

            }
            else {
              
            }

      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs

                // 0
                SuperSc.Checkgold(6000)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你想用金币交换筹码包么？ \r\n让我们生活得刺激点，来吧，小伙子! \r\n不过，你应该知道，手续费总是免不了的! \r\n手续费100金币，还要换么？ \r\n\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","退出","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","没钱你来干什么啊？ \r\n等你有钱了，你再来找我吧\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","返回","@main");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }

      public  void @changegold_5()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 
                SuperSc.Checkbaggage()
               && 
                // 0

              )
            {
              SuperSc.TakeItem("金币",6100);
SuperSc.GiveItem("筹码包",1);

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "text","你的包裹东西太多了，你看看，我放不下的! \r\n\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","退出","@exit");
Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n");
            }
            
      }
        }

        public class NpcScript_9Ega_B101: NpcScriptBase
        {
          // declare
          
    public int dPercent = 100;

    public int[] declareDetails = new int[] { 
        
      };  

    public string[] declareFns = new string[] { 
      
    }; 
    
          // goods
          
  public static List<GoodsItem> goodsItems = new List<GoodsItem>(new GoodsItem[]
    {
      
    }
  );
  
          // fns 
          
      public override void @main()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.EqualLVar("p9",0)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @main_1();
      

        SuperSc.BreakTimeRecall();
        

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.EqualLVar("p9",1)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @cube();
      

        SuperSc.BreakTimeRecall();
        

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.EqualLVar("p9",9)
              )
            {
              
      // goto
      @quit();
      

        SuperSc.BreakTimeRecall();
        

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            
      }

      public  void @main_1()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            SuperSc.MoveLVar("p9",0);
Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临赌场第一间房， 机遇房。\r\n这间房是赌场始发站， ");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","不要害怕，\r\n这间房没有陷阱。\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","祝福你， 一路顺风.....\r\n给你提供投骰子的机会。 \r\n祝你好运。  \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","下一步","@pre_cube");
      }

      public  void @pre_cube()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0,0
                SuperSc.Checkitem("筹码",1)
              )
            {
              SuperSc.MoveLVar("p9",1);
SuperSc.TakeItem("筹码",1);
SuperSc.MoveLVarRandom("d0",6);
SuperSc.IncLVar("d0",1);
SuperSc.Playdice(1,"@cube");
Say2Content(t, "text","正在投骰子。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","下一个","@cube");
            }
            else {
              Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","没有筹码了。 \r\n玩这个游戏需要有筹码 \r\n你无法继续赌博。 \r\n想继续进行，那准备好筹码后再来 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","退出","@quit");
SuperSc.MoveLVar("p9",9);
            }
            
      }

      public  void @quit()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            SuperSc.MoveMap("B11");
      }

      public  void @cube()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            Say2Content(t, "text","骰子的点数 ");

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n你可以前进 ");

Say2Content(t, "text","\r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","移动","@next_cube");
      }

      {
        // directs

                // 0,0
                SuperSc.EqualLVar("p9",0)
              )
            {

        SuperSc.BreakTimeRecall();
        

      // break

            else {

                // 0,0

              )

      // break

      {
        // directs

Say2Content(t, "text","欢迎光临  ");

Say2Content(t, "sayBindingText","USERNAME");
Say2Content(t, "text","打猎时所必要的道具。\r\n现在暂时可能不需要， 但通过剩余的房间时肯定会派上用处，\r\n祝你好运。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","下一步","@penalty");
      }

      public  void @quit()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_UselessIf
            SuperSc.MoveMap("B11");
      }

      public  void @penalty()
      {
        // directs
        
        // ifs
        
            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(3)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","恭喜你获得了火把。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","下一步","@race");
SuperSc.MoveLVar("p9",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("火把",1);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(3)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","恭喜你获得了地牢逃脱卷。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","下一步","@race");
SuperSc.MoveLVar("p9",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("地牢逃脱卷",1);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
            }
            

            // IfWrap_IfElse
            if(
                // 0
                SuperSc.RandomIs(3)
              )
            {
              Say2Content(t, "text","恭喜你获得了太阳水。 \r\n\r\n");
Say2Content(t, "sayBindingBtn","下一步","@race");
SuperSc.MoveLVar("p9",1);
SuperSc.GiveItem("太阳水",1);

      // break
      return;
            }
            else {
              
      // goto
      @penalty();
      
            }
            
      }

      public  void @race()
      {
        // directs
        Say2Content(t, "text","给你提供投骰子的机会。 \r\n祝你好运。 \r\n\r\n");
